text: Allakh miloserden k Svoim rabam. On ne vvergnet v zabluzhdeniye narod i ne budet sbivat' yego s pryamogo puti istiny posle togo, kak On nastavil na nego, i On ne nakazhet ikh, poka ne poshlot im cherez Svoyego poslannika Otkroveniye, raz"yasnyaya, chego ne sleduyet delat' i chego nado osteregat'sya. Poistine, Allakh o vsyakoy veshchi svedushch
